alert.note: Alert for Adair; Cherokee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 15 at 10:56PM CST until February 15 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Adair County in northeastern Oklahoma... Southeastern Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 1145 PM CST. * At 1056 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Pumpkin Center, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Tahlequah... Stilwell... Westville... Watts... Adair State Park... Eldon... Proctor... Christie... Maryetta... Cookson... Cherokee Landing State Park... Baron... Ballard... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
